data.title: Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology
meta_keywords: Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology
data.meta_description: Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology is a distinguished institution of higher learning acknowleged locally, nationally and globally for its excellence in providing opportunities for intellectual, personal and professional development.
